## PopulatableMoneyp.stakeMP() method

Stake MP to start earning fee revenue or increase existing stake.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stakeMP(amount: Decimalish): Promise<PopulatedMoneypTransaction<P, SentMoneypTransaction<S, MoneypReceipt<R, void>>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of MP to add to new or existing stake. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PopulatedMoneypTransaction](./lib-base.populatedmoneyptransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;P, [SentMoneypTransaction](./lib-base.sentmoneyptransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [MoneypReceipt](./lib-base.moneypreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, void&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out an existing MP stake's [collateral gain](./lib-base.mpstake.collateralgain.md) and [BPD gain](./lib-base.mpstake.bpdgain.md)<!-- -->.
